metadata.name: Margarita
metadata.description:
Image inspired by "The Master and Margarita" by Mikhail Bulgakov, where the Devil and his retinue come to Moscow and hold an extravagant ball, complete with vampires, witches, and many honored guests from earth and hell alike.

99% of proceeds from this sale and artist's fees go to support Ukraine. I'll be adding more NFTs to support Ukraine and Ukraine-based charities here and on Versum.
